page.title: 13Education in Gt.Addington.
page.content: Children come from Little Addington to Great Addington Church of England Aided Primary school.In 1985 there were 30 children altogether.There are 18 children in the infants class and 12 juniors.One infant comes from Irthlingborough.There are two teachers and 2 classes.There is a part time secretary.The school dinners come from Irthlingborough kichens.This school is a very small school and people are concerned that it may close.The building is in good condition at the moment.The walls want painting inside.This year the school has been given &600 capitation to spend on books and materials, we are always short of money.The PSA has raised about 400 pounds for the school.In 1985 a new Governing body was elected.There are 14 people on it including the head Teacher.
